job description:
A pharmaceutical company in Reston researches, develops, and patents novel medical treatments for unmet medical needs. Their engineering team builds applications for data processing, reporting processes, clinical studies, and custom apps for their pharmaceutical products. They are looking for a strong data scientist with 2-5 years of experience. You'll be primarily responsible for developing analytical models and providing data driven insights.

Required Skills & Experience
  • Advanced degree in computer science, mathematics, management science, engineering, (Master's degree required or Ph.D)
  • 2+ years' experience in data science, advanced analytics and model building
  • Experience with statistical analysis methods
  • Excellent visualizaiton experience using either Spotfire / Tableau / Clickview
  • Expereince with big data manipulation and analysis using varying frameworks/tools : SQL, Python, R SAS
  • Strong practical knowledge of analytical techniques and methodologies such as machine learning / data mining
Benefits:
  • Great health benefits
  • Flexible hours (10am start)
  • New office and expanding
  • Stocked kitchen
  • Stock options: generous compensation that reloads annually
  • PTO
